\usepackage{eso-pic}
\newcommand\BackgroundPic{
	\put(0,0){
		\parbox[b][\paperheight]{\paperwidth}{%
			\vfill
			\centering
			\includegraphics[width=\paperwidth,height=\paperheight]{images/bg.ps}%
			\vfill
}}}
